cleaned_text: Menopause from an Ayurvedic perspective Fenugreek or slippery elm or Shitavari (cut and sifted) 1 Tbsp Flax or chia seeds 1 Tbsp Fennel Seeds 1 Tbsp Marshmallow root Pour one quart of hot water over the herbs in a quart size mason jar.
